definition: Lei Gong or Duke of Thunder, the God of Thunder in Chinese mythology

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
the God of Thunder strikes bean curd/fig. to bully the weakest person/to pick on an easy target
the God of Thunder strikes bean curd, a bully picks the weakest person/to pick on an easy target
pinyin: Lei2 Gong1 da3 dou4 fu5 , jian3 ruan3 de5 qi1

sentences.english: Also, the form of TwHF extract used in the study isn't available for sale.
sentences.chinese: 再說，用於研究的雷公藤提取物還不適合銷售。

sentences.english: Little white received a mysterious message, he sent his old monkey led to the tripterygium wilfordii ridge.
sentences.chinese: 少白收到了神祕電報，他派老猴子帶隊前往雷公嶺。

sentences.english: The spirit of Pangu flied to heaven and was ordained as the God of Thunder.
sentences.chinese: 他的靈魂飛到了天上，變成了雷公。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Triptolide content in Radix Tripterygii is not constant during its storage.
sentences.chinese: 結論雷公藤甲素在雷公藤藥材中有不穩定現象存在。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Triptolide content in Radix Tripterygii is not constant during its storage.
sentences.chinese: 結論雷公藤甲素在雷公藤藥材中有不穩定現象存在。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of Tripterygium wilfordii Hook. f. on patients with uterine leiomyoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察雷公藤多甙治療子宮肌瘤的療效及副作用。

sentences.english: These results suggested that celastrol had certain immunological inhibition.
sentences.chinese: 以上結果表明雷公藤紅素具有較強的免疫抑制作用。

sentences.english: A survey of the herbs in the Leigong Mountain Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 雷公山自然保護區草本植物調查。

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence of eluent of different polarity on triptolide content.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究不同極性洗脫液對雷公藤內酯醇含量的影響。

sentences.english: Insecticidal Activities of the Non-alkaloid Extracts from Tripterygium wilfordii against Piers rapae L.
sentences.chinese: 雷公藤非生物鹼成分對菜青蟲殺蟲活性研究。

sentences.english: Thunder and killed an innocent widow, Qizou Emperor labeled her mother power.
sentences.chinese: 雷公打死了一個無辜的寡婦，啓奏玉帝把她封爲電母。

sentences.english: God of Thunder produces thunder to punish evildoers.
sentences.chinese: 雷公制造雷聲來處罰做壞事的人。

sentences.english: Leigong oilfield is one complicated block oil- field, and water channeling is serious here.
sentences.chinese: 雷公油田爲複雜斷塊油田，水竄問題比較嚴重。

sentences.english: The main ingredients of Tripterygium wilfordii are total alkaloids and terpenoid lactones.
sentences.chinese: 雷公藤生物鹼和總萜內酯是雷公藤主要有效成分。

sentences.english: The main ingredients of Tripterygium wilfordii are total alkaloids and terpenoid lactones.
sentences.chinese: 雷公藤生物鹼和總萜內酯是雷公藤主要有效成分。

sentences.english: The research aimed to study the spatial distribution pattern and fractal characteristics of Taiwania flousiana Gaussen population in Leigong Mountain of Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 研究貴州雷公山禿杉種羣空間分佈格局和分形特徵。

definition: used for the sound "zha" in certain names
Chi You, legendary creator of metalworking and weapons/comet
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)

Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
celestial troops and generals (idiom)/fig. superior forces
